Class BudgetManegement

java.lang.Object
Budget.BudgetManegement
public class BudgetManegement extends Object
Manages the budget system, including transactions, income sources, categories, and notifications. Provides methods to add, remove, and edit categories, transactions, and income sources.

    • editCategory

      public void editCategory(Category category, Category editedCategory)
      Edits an existing category in the budget. Updates the name, total amount, and spending limit of the category.
      Parameters:
      category - the category to edit
      editedCategory - the new details for the category
